main event: A single unidentified unconventional flying object was sighted over East St. Louis, Illinois on May 17, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as aluminum colored and disk-shaped with a glow around the edges,It hovered for several seconds before disappearing at a high rate of speed,The object was observed visually and with radar,The sighting was reported by personnel at Scotts Air Force Base,The original report was deemed to lack sufficient data for evaluation.
